# Introduction

A curated list of awesome resources for R package development.

If you wish to suggest any additional resources, please make a PR request here:

<https://github.com/IndrajeetPatil/awesome-r-pkgtools>

# Swiss Army knives

These package contain tools that are useful across all stages of package development, from the beginning to the end.

- `{devtools}`: <https://devtools.r-lib.org/>

- `{usethis}`: <https://usethis.r-lib.org/>

# Formatting R code

These packages can help you adopt a consistent coding style guide and format the code accordingly.

- `{styler}`: <https://styler.r-lib.org/> (especially relevant if you follow tidyverse style guide)

- `{formatR}`: <https://yihui.org/formatr/>

# Unit testing

- `{testthat}`: <https://testthat.r-lib.org/>

- `{tinytest}`: <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/tinytest/index.html>

- `{vdiffr}`: <https://vdiffr.r-lib.org/> (sisual regression testing)

# TO-DOs

Tools to keep track of things that you need to do in the future releases.

- `{TODOr}`: <https://github.com/dokato/todor> (RStudio add-in)
